column4: extras.ubuntu.com should be trusted, you can this key to your trusted keys with "sudo gpg --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv--keys 16126D3A3E5C1192"
that command isn't working.  stopping at --recv--keys
what do you mean by "stopping at --recv-keys" ? what error do you get exactly ?
That did the trick.  Thanks a ton! One day I'll know these crazy commands.
